file_content.text: ...We conclude this report by addressing the alleged sightings of an unidentified alien vessel on the remote planet Ilum.
Images of this starship, disseminated by untrustworthy sources, are pure fabrications. There is no truth, and no cause for alarm, in such baseless rumors.
Greetings, Red Rhombus! The Gree Enclave advances orange parallel to you with this unidirectional transmission message.
Greetings, honored biped! The Gree Enclave advances orange parallel to you with this unidirectional transmission message.
Jubilation progresses throughout the Enclave: Gray Secant, an ancient starship crafted by revered Gree ancestors, has reappeared from its multi-millennial task of exploration!
Gray Secant has chosen the world you call Ilum for its next site of analysis. The intricacies of your culture's warfare dominate its interest.
The Enclave deems you essential for analysis by Gray Secant. Join us on Ilum! Demonstrate combativeness for Gray Secant, and Gree technologies will be given in return!
